name: Cueyatl
movement: 30 feet walking, 20 feet climbing, 30 feet swimming
description: The Cueyatl is a small humanoid creature with adaptations for life in jungle environments, utilizing its natural camouflage for stealth.
memorable: Noteworthy for its venomous spear attacks and ability to escape grapples easily.
goals: Typically ambushes or outmaneuvers opponents in its jungle habitat.
relations: May be allied with other jungle-dwelling creatures or serve a larger evil entity.
strengths: Skilled in stealth and mobility, can breathe both in water and air.
weaknesses: Low armor class and hit points make it somewhat vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Attacks with a spear that inflicts both piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Can utilize jungle camouflage for higher stealth effectiveness in its native terrain.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing for a total of +3 on stealth checks.
additional_information: Amphibious, can thrive in both aquatic and terrestrial environments.
Has the slippery ability for escaping grapples.
Long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.
Uses its environment strategically to gain combat advantages.
Not especially strong but agile and cunning.
test_queries: small jungle ambush creature with poison
stealthy humanoid that attacks with spear
cunning humanoid that excels in stealth
quick jungle dweller with slippery escape
